Welcome!

You have successfully joined a plane. A plane is a virtual space you can customize for your needs by using a module. Many users can be connected to a plane at the same time and share its resources. This particular plane doesn't do much other than display this message. Try connecting to a plane using a different module under 'Planes -> List' above,\n or upload your own module under 'Modules -> Create' to learn more about what planeshift can do.\n
